resources.string: AppCovery helps you see Apps your friends are using. To get started, log in using your Facebook account
We absolutely DO NOT SPAM anyone. We do not email/post/sms your friend on your behalf.
Invitation Sent. Now sit back and relax - We will inform you as soon as someone joins so that you can see their apps.
We absolutely DO NOT SPAM anyone.

Find more friends by sharing AppCovery in your Facebook Wall. Your friends will see AppCovery in your wall and install it. Once they install, they will appear in your friend list. Click on the button below to continue.
Once you have few friends, we will notify you and you will be start exploring apps with friends.
To see more apps, get more friends. Simply click on the Invite Friends menu item to send app invitation.
From GCM: server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on Demo Server.
From Demo Server: successfully added device!
From Demo Server: successfully removed device!
Could not register device on Demo Server after %1$d attempts.
Could not unregister device on Demo Server (%1$s).
Invitation Sent. We will notify you once someone joins.
